channel.title: How do i change my clients name..?
channel.description:
Well i wanted to change my clients name and i cant find where i need to change this... heres a picture to show you..
[IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj280/silentownage/devilscor.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do i change my clients name..?
item.dc:creator: @kneeled_son kneeled son
item.source: How do i change my clients name..?

item.title: How do i change my clients name..?
item.dc:creator: @strengthpk strengthpk
item.description:
@strengthpk wrote:

lol right click the run.bat and edit the title name… easy… and if you need more than that go to client.java search the owner’s name and the servers name and edit all of that… also you can go into other files like GUI and FRAME1 and edit the clients name and person who made it… just be sure to give credits to the person who made the base.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my clients name..?

item.title: How do i change my clients name..?
item.dc:creator: @ztornado5 ztornado5
item.description:
@ztornado5 wrote:

wow, just go into cliient.java, do ctrl+h then type in the name it says in the first box,change the name you want it to be in the second box. after that right click on run.bat and click on edit. find the name and change to whatever you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my clients name..?

item.title: How do i change my clients name..?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:9, topic:241055”]Wow, he’s not trying to change the name of the client pop screen.
Right-click the batch file and hit edit,
the line
echo JvRleution Client V2 is what is says in your command prompt just simple edit the text.[/quote]
No.
Go into EGUI.java, search what you want to change, change it, compile. Done.

Read full topic
